General.Name: NORINCO International Cooperation Ltd
General.Description: Norinco International Cooperation Ltd. operates as an engineering contractor in Asia, Africa, Europe, and internationally. It is involved in the construction of various projects, such as railways, thermal power stations, hydropower stations, power transmission, transformation projects, petroleum, mineral facilities, housing, and municipal engineering. The company also develops real estate properties, such as residential and commercial projects. In addition, it offers services in the field of international engineering contracting, domestic construction engineering, heavy equipment export trade, logistics services, logistics automation equipment system integration, and solar energy. Further, it involved in the production and sales of metal packaging containers; bulk commodity trading activities; and solar energy product trading and new energy project development activities. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Beijing, China. Norinco International Cooperation Ltd. is a subsidiary of China North Industries Co., Ltd.
